author: Dr. Gokarna
text:
Everyday I am trying to be better than yesterday.
A little more conscious
A little more forgiving
A little more patient
More flow.. Less force...

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Happiness is not having what u want. It is appreciating what u have.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Every girl thinks of running away from their home at least once in their lifetime, not for love. But for freedom of doing whatever she wants in her life.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Most people die at 25 and buried at 75.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Do not live in the past, but accept it for what it is.Accept that it's ur story, it's ur journey.Past does not define u, but it has prepared u,shaped u. So,stop running from ur past.u're magic. U're worthy,u're incredible.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: U may be as colorful as a rainbow. The problem is that sometimes people around are just colour blind.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Real richness is when we are so expensive that no one can buy our character.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: There's reason why windshield is bigger than the rear view mirror. Where u're going is so much bigger, brighter and bolder than where u have been.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text:
Yes, I crave him.
 for his scent, his vibe, his company.❤

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Find the little child in u that gets excited about the little things. The child that has all the time in the world to appreciate all the beauty that surrounds u.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: When a child come to ur life, it is time to relearn life, not teach them ur ways.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Life is not about waiting for beautiful things to happen, it's about finding beauty in dark. Change the way u look at things and u may just find what u're searching for.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: To be happy, u must let go of what's gone, be grateful for what remains and look forward to what's coming next.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Things have a way of working themselves out. Be patient.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: She was beautiful even when u didn't notice.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Wait until u see why God made u wait.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Fear is actually a sign, that u're doing what's needed to move in the right direction.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: When u focus on ur gratitude, the tide of disappointment goes out and tide of love rushes in.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: When it's time for something new u will feel a desire to let go. Life does not take from us anything unless their is something else imminently awaiting for us. U will release the old, bcz u're clearing a path for what's ahead. Trust this process.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Appreciate where u're in your journey, even if it's not where u want to be. Every season serves a purpose.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: U have overcome everything life has thrown at u this far, and none of it has destroyed u.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Love what you have, before life teaches u love what u lost.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Lessons in the life are repeated until they are learned.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text:
Have faith. Whatever u're going through at this moment is where u're meant to be and it will bring u to the brighter future. 
Life has so much to offer u, but u must believe in urself and ur abilities.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Life is full of beauty. Travel with ur best frds and let the stars guide u home. Feel the wind in ur hair. Meet new people, explore new cities. Life is not measured by time, it is measured by moments. Focus on the things that matter. Capture feelings that make u feel most alive.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Kindness begins with understanding we all struggle.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: You will be the happiest soon.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text:
Most of the prblm in life are because of two reasons:
We act without thinking or we keep thinking without acting.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text:
While thinking about life, remember this :
No amount of guilt can change the past. 
And no amount of anxiety can change the future.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Honor your path. Stay patient. Remain calm. Be persistent towards your goal. Most of all trust your journey.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text:
Main shark tank ka concept samjh nhi pa rhi hun guys, ye log papa se kyn nhi mang rhe paise. 
And for that reason I am out.

author: Dr. Gokarna
text: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
